page.title: 14Prescote Manor Farm
page.content: Mr Milner,the farmer, gave us a map of the fields and their uses. Winter Wheat:- Grass for Silage:- Prescote Bank East| Bridge Meadow Prescote Bank West| Freemans Long Ground | Up.River Checkleys Cabin Ground | Home Ground(1/2) Big Fuzzons | Ankers Rushy Ground | Three Corners |Grass for Grazing:- Groggy Ground | Broadmoor Field Broad Moor Ley | Back Meadow Duck Meadow | Dairy Ground West Little Meadow | Dairy Ground East Long Meadow | Little Meadow (a) Freemans(a) Winter Barley:- Home Ground(1/2) Before White Barn| Pilkingtons |Old Womans Hovel-Peas Big Hill |Little Hill- Oats Square Hays | Over Wooden Bridge&Amos Meadow-Turnips
